bookBuilder.title: Kuisa BookBuilder

upload.title: Kuisa zvinyorwa zvako
upload.dragDrop: Kwevedza uye uise faira ye ZIP pano
upload.supportedFormats: Zvinotenderwa: Mafaira eZIP ane zvinyorwa zveWord (.docx)

messages.importTip: üìù Zano Rekupinza: Kana magwaro enyu eWord aine zvirimo zvakasiyana (mazita, tafura yezvirimo, ruzivo rwemunyori, nezvimwe), BookBuilder inogona kugadzira zvikamu zvimwe. Mushure mekupinza, munogona kubvisa zvikamu zvisingadiwe uye kufambisa zvirimo pakati peZvinhu Zvekutanga, Zvinhu Zvikuru, neZvinhu Zvekupedzisira sezvinodiwa.
messages.systemPages: Peji Rezita neCopyright zvinogadzirwa zvega - chero peji yezita/copyright yakapinzwa yakasiyiwa.
messages.languageNote: Magwaro achatsanangurwa achishandisa maitiro emutauro we{{language}}.
messages.noContent: Hapana zvikamu zvezvirimo zvakaonekwa - ndapota tarisa faira yako yeZIP.
messages.processingError: Kukanganisa mukugadzirisa faira yeZIP. Ndapota tarisa chimiro chefaira uye uyedze zvakare.
messages.emptyZip: Faira yeZIP inoita seyakashaya kana isina magwaro anotsigirwa.
messages.invalidFormat: Chimiro chefaira chisina kukodzera. Ndapota isa faira yeZIP ine magwaro eWord.

classification.title: Ongorora Kutsanangura Magwaro
classification.subtitle: Kwenya zvikamu pakati pemapoka kuti uronge chimiro chebhuku rako
classification.frontMatterDesc: Peji remusoro, kodzero dzemugwadi, kukumikidza, mashoko ekutanga, rondedzero yezvirimo
classification.backMatterDesc: Mhedziso, mashoko ekupedzisira, zvakawedzerwa, duramazwi, rondedzero, mareferenzi

bookBuilder.dragToReorder: Kwenya zvikamu kuti uronge zvakare mukati memapoka kana shandisa "FAMBISA" dropdown kushandura zvikamu pakati peZvinhu Zvekutanga/Zvikuru/Zvekupedzisira
